doc.title: Jack & Jenny
doc.plot: Jack suspects his wife, Jenny, is cheating on him and gets proof of her affair in photographs. After a dispute with her lover he comes home, horribly injured, and bandages himself up. Just as he finishes, his wife Jenny wakes up in the bedroom, tied up to the bed posts. Jack comes into the room and demands her to admit her affair to him. Due to his facial injuries his appearance and voice differs from usual and isn't recognizable by Jenny. As Jack brings out his inner emotions, Jenny discovers that it's actually her husband and finally realizes the entire situation. But is it too late for her? Will Jack forgive her?
